ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: ... undyingly. ... Waspinator, contact Set, or Shuko, or both of them and let them know we have Ra, and without him his dieties cannot form Dark Messhia. ...

::: Megatron leaned over Ra's body as he woke up for the seconed time. His 
red eyes opened, and he stood up and looked around the caveren. :::

::: Ra ::: You are Megatron, my master. I am programmed to serve you, 
undyingly.

::: Megatron, in his beast mode ::: Ah yes. The process was a success. Now, 
Waspinator, contact Set, or Shuko, or both of them and let them know we have 
Ra, and without him his dieties cannot form Dark Messhia.

::: Waspinator nodded, and sent the message while Ra bowed contunuoulsy to 
Megatron. :::

::: Megatron ::: Thats enough, Ra. Together, you and i are going to make a 
few changes in the beasts wars, definetly.

~~~~~~~~`

::: Marine took several shots, but fired two green optic laster back at 
Anubis and Hades, while Gremlin took a few shots at Shuko along with Jackle. 
Pheniox, attavcking from the sky shot numerous fire balls at serpentor. The 
autoguns, and Transanulas fired at unitron. Scourge and Rampage fired missles 
and pulse lasrers at Sixshots head, Rampage being in his tank mode rammed 
into the lef, and sunk his teeth into his armor. Black Aracnia fired a series 
of bowcaster missles at Sixshot, tring to bring him down.  :::

::: Hell Beast ::: Inferno, we shall be victorious.

::: Inferno ::: As you command it my Queen.

::: Hell Beast ::: Raise shileds to full percent, and bring up the emergency 
auto-guns.

::: Inferno worked quickly at the computer and it was done. :::

::: Hell Beast then turned to Cyber Claw ::: Megatron? You want to kill him? 
Well, for the time being you WILL go out there and help us get rid of these 
pests or I wont tell you. Is that clear, fembot?

~~~~~~~~~~

::: Set recived the Message, with Ominous behinde him. They were a bit 
shocked. :::

::: Set ::: Damn! We cant attack them....they wou-

::: The ship rattled and on the main veiwer was a picture of Megatron, 
Waspinator, and Ra assulting the ship. :::

::: Set ::: Ominous, get out there and fight!

::: Ominous looked at him in disgust ::: Agianst them, Ill be killed!

::: Set ::: Coward, do I have to do everything?!!

::: Ominous didnt tolerate anyone, and with that comment, Set just made his 
list. :::

::: Ominous slammed his fist into the control pannel, sending spark shooting 
off. ::: Set, one thing you should know about me is that I dont take orders 
from ass holes!

::: Set shot Ominous who took it in his arm, and then ran out of te bridge, 
scraming, ::: Fine, lets see how much damage Megatron and his minions can do 
in here!

::: Set ghasped, for Ominous had just dropped the shields and now Megatron, 
Ra, and Waspinator were within the ship, blowing it to bits. :::

::: Set ::: Shuko, I need some of your merceneries! I ca-

::: Megatron burst inside ::: Set, surrender now or be destroyed!

::: Set ::: You stupid savage, I can have a dozen warriors here within 
minutes!

::: Megatron ::: Wrong answer.

::: Waspinator shot a stinger missle at set, who tried to block it but fell 
to the ground, unconscience. :::

::: Ominous ::: Well, thats that. I guess Im a rouge once agian. Feel free to 
help your selfs to what ever you need, Im sure-

::: Ominous fell tto the ground with a gaping hole in his back that Megatron 
had just fired. :::

::: Megatron ::: Idiot, Im not letting you leave.

::: Ra ::: Master, what do we do now?

::: Megatron ::: Gather some supplies, and then we blow this ship to bits.

::: Just as Megatron had said that, the internal defences turned on, only 
reconizing Ra :::

::: Megatron ::: Ra, turn these off now!

:: Ra jumped on a computer and the defences froze. Now Megatron, Waspinator, 
and Ra began to gather supplies. ::::
